text: @SaraCarterDC Let's state the obvious. Greta Thunberg will be on CNN's expert Chinese Covid19 panel for 2 reasons: 1)Compassionate photo optics. 2)Most important: To connect the dots. What dots you may ask? The so-called dots between Covid19 & Climate Change. Should be fascinating propaganda.
